#summary 4NT Bundle : btm (Batch to Memory - 4NT, TakeCommand Script) file type bundle
#labels Featured,Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation

= Details =

Updates both the file type and syntax plug-in for btm (Batch to Memory - [http://www.jpsoft.com/4ntdes.htm 4NT], [http://www.jpsoft.com/tcmddes.htm TakeCommand] Script) file type Bundle. Includes simple user and omni completion.
